attributes.description: The week's selection of beef & pork recipes
This week’s selection for vegetarians
All recipes that adhere to our healthy criteria
These recipes are naturally plant-based.
All the week's chicken recipes
Easy, speedy recipes for busy days
The week's selection of fish recipes

attributes.meta_title: View All Gousto Recipes | Recipe Ideas from Gousto
attributes.description: Not sure what to cook for dinner? Browse our full library of delicious recipe ideas
attributes.meta_description: Not sure what to cook for dinner? Browse our full library of delicious recipe ideas.

attributes.description: Dairy-free recipes: see our FAQs for details.
These recipes do not contain gluten and are suitable for coeliacs.
Everyone's favourite recipes. Easy to make and enjoyed by all, these recipes are always available to buy.
To create a luxurious chicken curry, you'll infuse creamy coconut stock with sweet dates, ginger and tangy tamarind. Serve over buttery basmati rice with a fresh cucumber, tomato and coriander salad.
attributes.name: Chicken, Date & Tamarind Curry

attributes.description: Load up warmed naan flatbreads with lemony fish, fresh Greek salad and tangy caper mayo – Delish!
attributes.name: 10-Min Mediterranean Fish Gyros

attributes.description: This Sichuan-inspired dish has so many rich, mouthwatering flavours in one bowl. The creamy, nutty sauce is made with tahini, and helps tame the heat from the hot chilli oil.
attributes.name: Spicy Pork Dan Dan Noodles & Pak Choi

attributes.description: Mix our BBQ spice blend through the tomato base to create these deliciously smoky BBQ chicken pizzas. Winner, winner chicken dinner!
attributes.name: Smoky BBQ Chicken Pizza

attributes.description: For pizza night perfection, this flavourful veggie option is one of our faves. The creamy mozzarella and cherry tomatoes are a classic pair, and we've added a dollop of easy, cheesy basil pesto for a twist!
attributes.name: Cherry Tomato & Homemade Basil Pesto Pizza

attributes.description: Brilliant for weeknights and slurp-tastic for adults and children alike! Rustle up a simply perfect spag bol with a rich meaty sauce topped with lashings of melty cheddar & fresh basil – dinner is served!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Spag Bol

attributes.description: For this fragrant fried rice, you'll toss Cornish crab and rice in a punchy Thai curry, Sriracha and fresh chilli sauce. To add freshness at the end, serve with coriander and a squeeze of lime.
attributes.name: Fragrant Thai Crab Rice With Lime

attributes.description: You won't even have to turn the oven on for this one. Top tender potatoes and crisp green beans with a tangy lemon dressing, serve with simple pan-fried smoked fish and garnish with lemon zest.
attributes.name: Smoked Fish With Warm Green Bean & Potato Salad

attributes.description: Fish and chips aren’t just for Friday – you’ll want to eat this version all week! Do away with grease-soaked newspaper and coat your fish in chive crumbs instead, using lemony mayo as a dip for chips. On the table in just 30 minutes.
attributes.name: Feel Good Fish 'N’ Chips

attributes.description: Salmon isn't just a super source of omega-3 and healthy fats, it's also delicious in this wholesome salad with fibre-rich bulgur wheat, fresh courgette ribbons, feta, peas and fresh mint.
attributes.name: Salmon With Courgette Ribbon & Feta Salad

attributes.description: This sweet chilli fish is a breeze to prepare, and will leave you with the exotic, spicy flavours of South East Asia. Our chilli jam provides the sweetness, which works perfectly with the umami richness of the garlic & sesame pak choi, along with fragrant ginger rice.
attributes.name: Sweet Chilli Fish & Sesame Pak Choi

attributes.description: Whip out your wok and get sticky British pork, crisp greens and fluffy rice on the table in no time! To serve, garnish with a sprinkle of fresh chilli. Simple, spicy and full of garlicky goodness!
attributes.name: Spicy Hoisin Pork With Ginger & Sesame Veg

attributes.description: This veggie stir-fry is packed with peppers, carrots and oodles of udon. You'll coat chewy noodles in a delicious spicy sauce, toss in your veg and top it with a sesame crusted fried egg. Chop, stir, toss, done!
attributes.name: 10-Min Veggie Udon & Sesame Fried Egg

attributes.description: This nutritious black rice salad is tossed in a punchy chilli lime dressing. Serve topped with sesame-crusted salmon to add omega-3 goodness and plenty of protein to your plate.
attributes.name: Sesame Salmon & Crunchy Black Rice Salad

attributes.description: The goodness of our cottage pie lies beneath its smooth, cheesy mash topping. Pan-fried beef mince soaks in rich stock, ramping up the flavour before you scoop it out and serve with vibrant green broccoli.
attributes.name: Comforting Cottage Pie

attributes.description: Quesadillas made easy! Stuff soft tortilla wraps with spicy pulled chicken, cheddar cheese and homemade refried beans, before baking it all in the oven. Serve with a zesty slaw and chipotle mayo to dip!
attributes.name: Chicken & Bean Quesadillas With Zesty Slaw

attributes.description: This dish is inspired by one called Ash Reshteh - a herby, pulse-based soup full of goodness. For our version, you'll make the broth from dill, coriander, parsley, mint and spinach. You'll pack it full with fine egg noodles, kidney beans and lentils, and top with sour cream and homemade crispy onions. Mmmmmm!
attributes.name: Warming Herby Persian Noodle Soup

attributes.description: Warm your cockles with this alpine-inspired gratin. You'll simmer tender British chicken, leeks and gnocchi in a creamy mustard sauce, before topping it with a sage crumb and baking until golden. Délicieux!
attributes.name: Simple Chicken, Leek & Gnocchi Gratin

attributes.description: “From my new Veggie Lean in 15 book, this hearty, nutty curry is super satisfying with slow release energy from roasted sweet potato and added lentils for a Gousto twist. Finish it off with a squeeze of lime, a dollop of yoghurt and some crunchy roasted peanuts. Winner!”
attributes.name: Joe’s Satay Sweet Potato & Kale Curry

attributes.description: This mild chicken curry packs in flavours, no punches needed. Mild isn't a byword for boring, because its creamy sauce pairs perfectly with turmeric and sultana rice for a family-pleasing treat.
attributes.name: Mild Chicken Curry

attributes.description: Be blown away by these amazing BBQ fajitas, filled with barbecue chicken, cheddar cheese, natural yoghurt and vegetables, all wrapped up in soft tortillas.
attributes.name: Smoky 'N' Sweet BBQ Chicken Fajitas

attributes.description: For this speedy supper, you'll slice a sweet Romano pepper before cooking with tender diced chicken, crème fraîche and pre-made red pesto. Garnish with a sprinkling of fresh basil and grated cheddar to finish. And hey pesto, dinner is served!
attributes.name: 10-Min Creamy Red Pesto Chicken Pasta

attributes.description: This Middle Eastern dish brings you spiced lamb meatballs flavoured with chopped dates, smoky paprika and spicy cayenne. You'll make a warming harissa-red pepper sauce to dollop over the herby tabbouleh, alongside some creamy yoghurt sprinkled with sumac. Harissamazing!
attributes.name: Lamb Meatballs With Bulgur & Hot Red Pepper Sauce

attributes.description: Whizz up spinach with coriander, chilli, spring onion and lime juice to make a nutrient-packed green dressing for your spicy protein-rich chicken, black beans and quinoa.
attributes.name: Spicy Chicken, Green Quinoa & Avocado

health_kitchen.disclaimer: High in iron, magnesium and B vitamins reducing tiredness and fatigue

attributes.description: Stir fry beef strips and pak choi before tossing through egg noodles and topping it all off with sesame seeds and chilli – winner winner, 10-min dinner!
attributes.name: 10-Min Asian Beef & Pak Choi Noodles

attributes.description: Packed with succulent chicken and an oh-so-creamy sauce, this delicious, hearty pie is full of sweet leeks and carrots too. Top the lot with dollops of crispy skin-on mash and enjoy with garlicky spring greens on the side.
attributes.name: Creamy Chicken Potato-Topped Pie

attributes.description: Scaloppine is a classic Italian dish where thin pieces of chicken, veal or beef are coated in flour and sautéed until golden. In this recipe, you'll be topping chicken breasts with a buttery lemon and caper sauce, to serve alongside crispy roast potatoes and fresh green beans.
attributes.name: Venetian Chicken Scaloppine With Green Beans

attributes.description: "There's no meat in sight in these burritos! Instead you'll fill 'em with coriander rice and umami-rich mushrooms flavoured with chipotle paste and smoked paprika. Finish with a homemade roasted red pepper, chilli and pumpkin seed salsa and a dollop of sour cream. Bangin'!"
attributes.name: Chipotle Mushroom Burritos & Red Pepper Salsa

attributes.description: For healthy slow-release energy and plenty of fibre, you'll fill this spiced salad with lean chicken breast, wholesome bulgur wheat and chickpeas, then toss with harissa, honey and lemon dressing.
attributes.name: Chicken, Herby Bulgur & Honey Harissa Dressing

health_kitchen.disclaimer: High in iron, magnesium and B vitamins reducing tiredness and fatigue

attributes.description: This Indian-inspired beef keema bake offers a twist on cottage pie. Made with gently spiced beef and crispy turmeric roasted potatoes, garnished with coriander. A simple dish that's easy to love!
attributes.name: Crispy Potato-Topped Beef Keema Pie

attributes.description: Dark leafy greens are packed with A, K and B vitamins – and lots of fibre to boot! For a balanced supper, serve them with boiled eggs, sweet potato, heart-healthy avocado and tamari-roasted pumpkin seeds.
attributes.name: Green Goodness Bowl With Egg & Sweet Potato

attributes.description: This creamy green risotto is brimming with sweet peas and aromatic fresh herbs. You'll pair it with melty feta that's baked to perfection, and a sprinkle of pumpkin seeds for crunch. Delish!
attributes.name: Pea Green Risotto With Seedy Baked Feta

attributes.description: This veggie spag bol is slurp-ready to eat in 30 minutes. Rustle up a rich meat-free sauce and top with a good sprinkle of cheddar and fresh basil and you’re good to go!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Meat-Free Spag Bol

attributes.description: Dal is enjoyed across the whole of India. Our simply delicious plant-based version is a warmly spiced, velvety stew that's topped with roasted aubergine, creamy coconut yoghurt and fresh coriander. Dal-icious!
attributes.name: Two-Lentil Dal & Spiced Aubergine

attributes.description: This cheeky chicken dinner is so easy to make. For the spicy Portuguese-style sauce, you'll use fresh lemon juice, chilli and vinegar to both marinate your chicken and spice up the mayo. Hot stuff!
attributes.name: Peri Peri Chicken, Chips & Apple Slaw

attributes.description: Whip up this smoky one-pot minestrone in no time! For this wholesome soup, you'll sizzle chorizo before stirring in macaroni, butter beans, carrot and baby kale. Sprinkle with cheddar, and it's done!
attributes.name: 10-Min One-Pot Chorizo Minestrone

attributes.description: Tuck into a delicious bowl of plant-based goodness. First, a simple hummus with a twist – you'll whizz up chickpeas with tahini, garlic, spicy harissa and lemon juice. Next, a salad of wholesome roasted vegetables and fibre-rich freekeh with a side of lemony salad. (Dairy-free: see our FAQs for details.)
attributes.name: Harissa Hummus, Roasted Veg & Freekeh Salad

attributes.description: For this tasty plant-based Thai curry, you'll use coconut yoghurt to make a super silky fragrant sauce for sweet butternut squash and red onion petals. Finished with fresh chilli, roasted peanuts and coriander and served with basmati rice. Coco-nice!
attributes.name: Thai-Style Butternut Squash & Coconut Curry

attributes.description: This warming pork chilli is everything you want on a weeknight. With smoky chipotle flavour, bulgur wheat to soak up the sauce, a fresh apple & red onion salsa and grated cheddar cheese – it's packing heat and flavour!
attributes.name: Mexican Pork Chilli With Apple Salsa

attributes.description: Cooking spice-crusted fish until it's blackened might seem wrong, but we're telling you - your fish gains some epic flavour! Add fresh and tangy salsa to balance the spice and enjoy those tacos.
attributes.name: 10-Min Blackened Fish Tacos & Pineapple Salsa

attributes.description: For this tray bake, you'll make a sticky tamarind, honey, orange and ginger sauce. Pour it all over earthy beets, potatoes, chicken thigh and butter beans. Pop it in the oven and enjoy!
attributes.name: Sticky Glazed Chicken & Beetroot Tray Bake

attributes.description: Take a gastronomic trip to Spain with this Mediterranean delight. You’ll pair meaty, sweet monkfish fillets with a punchy romesco sauce made with almonds, garlic and roasted Romano pepper and tomato. Serve with crispy thyme-infused potatoes and tender asparagus spears. (Gluten-free, suitable for coeliacs).

images.description: Premium speciality ingredients, indulgent flavours and classic European sides.
images.title: Fine Dine In

attributes.name: Pan-Fried Monkfish, Romesco, Thyme-Roasted Potatoes & Asparagus

attributes.description: In just 10 minutes, you'll be digging into this flavoursome North African-inspired beef stew with harissa, baharat and roasted garlic. Serve it with fruity couscous and fresh herbs. Sizzle, simmer, done!
attributes.name: 10-Min Baharat Beef Stew With Fruity Couscous

attributes.description: Introducing our amazing cheese toastie with an Indian twist! Simply spread mango chutney onto fluffy naan, and top with cheddar, freshly sliced chilli, spring onion and a mix of spices. Then sandwich together, pan-fry until melted in the middle, and serve with roast sweet potato and mixed salad.
attributes.name: Cheddar, Chilli & Mango Naan Toastie With Salad

attributes.description: For this fabulously simple fish curry, you'll simmer smoked basa with golden-fried onion, spices and a swirl of clotted cream for deliciously satisfying richness with minimal fuss. Served over green bean rice, this is a deliciously speedy curry for when you're in a hurry!
attributes.name: Smoky Fish Curry & Green Bean Rice

attributes.description: This stroganoff-inspired supper is easy, tasty comfort food. You'll add smoky paprika and chilli to British chicken and mushrooms, before folding your linguine into the creamy sauce. Strogan-off the charts!
attributes.name: Smoky Chicken & Mushroom Linguine

attributes.description: This silky sauce is infused with saffron to coat al dente linguine for a quick and easy bowl of comfort food. Pack this pasta with courgette ribbons and haddock bites for a touch of class!
attributes.name: Creamy Saffron, Haddock & Courgette Linguine

attributes.description: Fish and chips aren’t just for Friday – you’ll want to eat this version all week! Do away with grease-soaked newspaper and coat your fish in chive crumbs instead, using lemony mayo as a dip for chips. On the table in just 30 minutes.
attributes.name: Feel Good Fish 'N' Chips With Peas

attributes.description: Juicy king prawns are fried with crispy British chorizo and wrapped in soft tortillas with a zingy dressing, creamy avocado and crunchy lettuce.
attributes.name: 10-Min Prawn, Chorizo & Avocado Tacos

attributes.description: This smoky fajita pizza is packed with sweetcorn, red pepper, green chilli and double cheese! Serve with a chipotle mayo dip and dig in!
attributes.name: Veggie Fajita Pizza With Chipotle Mayo

attributes.description: For this moreishly good fried chicken burger, you'll coat strips of British chicken thighs in cayenne pepper, soy sauce and cornflour and fry until crisp and golden. Pack the chicken tenders into fluffy brioche with lettuce and sliced tomato, top with spicy Sriracha mayo and serve with homemade oven chips. YUM!
attributes.name: Fried Chicken Burger With Sriracha Mayo

attributes.description: This gorgeous dish is ready in a flash, thanks to the quick-cook gnocchi. There’s plenty of flavour: homemade tomato sauce packed with cherry tomatoes, garlic paste, Chinese rice wine and fresh basil, all topped with crumbled goats' cheese and a handful of rocket
attributes.name: 10-Min Tomato & Goats' Cheese Gnocchi

attributes.description: Our vibrant, plant-based twist on a classic Italian dish isn't just gorgeous to eat – it's so simple. Cooking pasta in the potato water saves on washing up, and the speedy basil pesto recipe will show you how easy that is to make. It's tasty pasta, pronto!
attributes.name: Pasta Alla Genovese

attributes.description: For this crowd pleasing tray bake, you'll roast juicy sausages with a colourful mix of red cabbage, leeks and a tangy green tomato chutney sauce. Simply delicious!
attributes.name: Sausage, Red Cabbage & Leek Tray Bake

attributes.description: Whether it’s fresh out the oven or tomorrow’s lunch, lasagne is always a firm family favourite. You'll add a splash of Henderson’s Relish to this comfort food classic for a flavourful Gousto twist!
attributes.name: Big Flavour Beef Lasagne

attributes.description: You'll blitz up spinach to make this orzo super green (and sneak in extra veg!). Cook your orzo and chicken in this spinach-y stock, then top with roasted cherry tomatoes and a little bit of cheddar. Popeye would be proud!
attributes.name: Joe's Super Green Chicken & Spinach Orzo

attributes.description: Dal is India's comfort food. This easy version is topped with crispy mushrooms and coriander chutney to add both texture and zing to this spiced bowlful.
attributes.name: Crispy Mushroom Dal, Coriander Chutney

attributes.description: When the craving for chicken goujons hits, miss the freezer staple and make your own instead! This easy recipe is complete with chunky oven chips to dunk into homemade cheesy baked beans.
attributes.name: Homemade Chicken Goujons & Cheesy Beans

attributes.description: Cook crispy tofu like a pro in this Asian-inspired plant-based recipe. Serve your tofu with sesame rice and a generous drizzle of homemade peanut satay sauce. Yum!
attributes.name: Crispy Tofu, Satay Sauce & Sesame Rice

attributes.description: "This summery low-carb recipe takes its inspiration from Mexico and will be on the table in just 10 minutes! Spice-crusted rump steaks and popped black beans top the salad, with a zingy chipotle & orange dressing really bringing the dish to life!"
attributes.name: 10-Min Steak Salad, Chipotle & Orange Dressing

attributes.description: Enhance the juicy, succulent flavours of your prime steak with our version of a béarnaise sauce, which is a little bit lighter, a lot easier and just as luxurious.

images.description: Premium sourced ingredients, indulgent flavours and heavenly combinations.
images.title: Fine Dine In

images.description: Reared in Northern Ireland, this stunning 21-day aged sirloin is buttery soft and delicious.
images.title: British Sirloin Steak

attributes.name: 21-Day Aged Sirloin, Béarnaise Sauce & Roasted Potatoes

attributes.description: Brilliant for weeknights and slurp-tastic for adults and children alike! Rustle up a simply perfect turkey spag bol – leaner than beef and served with lashings of melty cheddar & fresh basil. Dinner is served!
attributes.name: Simply Perfect Turkey Spag Bol

attributes.description: Based on the silky Thai soup, tom kha gai, you'll infuse British chicken and coconut stock with lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, ginger and fresh chillies. Serve with rice for a complete meal in a bowl!
attributes.name: Chicken Tom Kha Soup With Basmati Rice

attributes.description: If curry's what you crave, this fragrant plant-based balti is perfect. It's packed with oven-roasted cauliflower and red pepper, which add natural sweetness to the richly spiced tomato sauce. Enjoy every bite with steamed basmati rice and a scatter of flaked almonds.
attributes.name: Vegetable Balti With Fragrant Rice

attributes.description: “From my Lean in 15: The Shape Plan, this dish is comfort food with a Gousto twist. It's lean, tender chicken breast with a creamy sauce packed with spinach and roasted cherry tomatoes. Don't forget crispy roast potatoes on the side for this banging crowdpleaser!”
attributes.name: Joe’s Popeye’s Chicken With Crispy Potatoes

attributes.description: Bursting with fresh herbs, garlic and citrus, zhoug is Middle Eastern cuisine's answer to a pesto or salsa verde. Serve over roasted squash and bulgur jewelled with nuts and dried cranberries.
attributes.name: Roasted Squash, Jewelled Bulgur & Zhoug

attributes.description: Celebrate Easter with this fun family fave! You'll make a minty lamb meatloaf, coated in a cranberry glaze and serve with rosemary roast potatoes, carrots, garlicky spring greens and lashings of gravy. A perfect way to get everyone around the table.
attributes.name: Minty Lamb Meatloaf, Rosmary Roasts & Gravy

attributes.description: This dry-style curry draws influence from the region's 450-year Portuguese colonial rule. Balchao refers to the use of vinegar as a way of preserving fish and meat, giving this dish a distinctive hot & sour flavour, similar to what you'd expect from a vindaloo.
attributes.name: Goan Prawn Balchão Curry With Basmati Rice

attributes.description: Fragrant Thai red curry paste forms the punchy backbone to this velvety peanut-based sauce. Enjoy with tender chicken breast, steamed rice and a sprinkling of crispy fried onions for crunch. Panang with a punch!
attributes.name: Southern Thai Chicken Panang Curry

attributes.description: This simple plant-based curry is packed with flavour: hints of fruit from our tamarind paste, plus fenugreek, turmeric and garam masala. You’ll roast paprika-spiced cauliflower till it’s golden and crispy, and serve it on top, along with toasted almonds. (Gluten and dairy-free, suitable for coeliacs.)
attributes.name: Spiced Cauliflower, Spinach & Tamarind Dal

attributes.description: Flash-fry rump steak and cherry tomatoes before making a rosemary pan sauce and serve everything over a creamy, cheesy polenta – all in 10 min!
attributes.name: 10-Min Steak, Seared Tomatoes & Cheesy Polenta

attributes.description: This 10-Min halloumi salad is packed with flavour- salty halloumi, a sweet and spicy orange dressing and tangy pickled carrot. Toss it all together with harissa couscous and dinner is served!
attributes.name: 10-Min Halloumi, Couscous & Orange Salad

attributes.description: This simple, comforting dish pairs British pork loin steaks with a creamy peppercorn sauce. Serve with a side of crushed buttery potatoes and crisp green beans for a touch of class. Delicious!
attributes.name: Pork Loin, Buttery Potatoes & Peppercorn Sauce

attributes.description: This fragrant coconut curry is mild in terms of spice but packs a flavour punch with aromatic lemongrass, ginger and garlic. The outer lemongrass stalks add a beautiful fragrance to the rice, which subtly echoes the flavour of the curry. (Gluten and dairy-free, suitable for coeliacs.)
attributes.name: Mild Cambodian Chicken Samla Curry

attributes.description: Seasonal butternut squash is perfect layered over tangy goats' cheese with rosemary, red onion and spinach on top of flaky butter pastry.  Serve it with a balsamic dressed spinach salad, studded with sweet and crunchy candied pecans. Squash goals!
attributes.name: Butternut Squash & Goats' Cheese Tart

attributes.description: This chipotle beef burger is topped with nacho chilli-cheese sauce and a Mexican tomato salsa known as ‘pico de gallo’. Your crispy potatoes are the perfect tool for scooping up any of that extra gooey sauce. Buen provecho!
attributes.name: Nacho Chilli Cheese Burger & Crispy Potatoes

attributes.description: Juicy sausages. Creamy mash. Onion marmalade? Not your regular trio, we know. It’s onion marmalade that gives your gravy a rich tang, bringing this British comfort classic to life. Crisp green beans and oven-roasted carrots make it bursting with goodness too!
attributes.name: Extra Special Bangers 'N’ Mash

attributes.description: Fish sandwiches are found all over Scandinavia, especially near the harbour. For our version, you'll top ciabatta with fresh lettuce, golden breaded basa, a tangy caper 'remoulade' sauce and crispy oven chips. Scandi-lously good!
attributes.name: Open Scandi-Style Fish Sandwich

attributes.description: This recipe is inspired by a Thai dish called Pla Rad Prik  (deep fried crispy whole fish). For our easy version, you'll use basa fillets, coat them in soy and cornflour, then pan-fry until golden and crisp. Serve with a hot, sweet and sour tamarind sauce and plenty of chilli and coriander.
attributes.name: Thai Crispy Fish With Tamarind Sauce

attributes.description: Layer this tasty courgette pasta up with not one, but three cheeses for a veggie and family friendly wholesome midweek bake!
attributes.name: 3 Cheese Veg-Packed Pasta Bake

attributes.description: Put down your knife and fork because this American classic is tastier with your hands! Crispy chicken is tossed in an irresistibly fiery homemade buffalo sauce and served with the perfect side – a cool, creamy ranch dip. What a winner!
attributes.name: Buffalo Chicken, Ranch Dip & Sweet Potato Fries

attributes.description: To make a stew inspired by the Turkish dish, Alinazik kebab, you'll top couscous with richly spiced lamb stew and roasted aubergine yoghurt. Serve with roasted vegetables and fresh dill. Lezzetli!
attributes.name: Turkish Lamb Stew & Aubergine Yoghurt

attributes.description: Fill your bowl with a selection of umami-rich mushrooms, broccoli, protein-packed quinoa and quick pickled carrot ribbons. Then drizzle your colourful salad with a sweet miso dressing and dig in.

roundel.name: Health Kitchen - Good for your gut

attributes.name: Mushroom & Broccoli Bowl With Miso Dressing

health_kitchen.disclaimer: 53% RDA fibre and a source of calcium which keeps the digestive system healthy

attributes.description: Beloved for its rich, comforting flavours, kedgeree has been a supper staple since the Victorian era. Made with smoky fish, golden-fried onion, basmati rice, spices and a perfectly boiled egg, our version is served with slow roast cherry tomatoes on the side for sweetness.
attributes.name: Classic Kedgeree With Roast Cherry Toms

attributes.description: The smoky, savoury flavour of mackerel pair perfectly with this creamy linguine. To add bright flavours to your fish, serve with a squeeze of lemon, fresh dill and chives. Holy mackerel!
attributes.name: Linguine With Smoked Mackerel, Lemon & Chives

attributes.description: Tuck into succulently tender pork loin steaks with a comforting mustard sauce, creamy garlic-infused mash and a side of crisp mangetout.
attributes.name: Pork Steak, Garlic Mash & Mustard Sauce

attributes.description: Classic flavours come together in this easy oven-baked orzo recipe. You'll make a herby green butter with fresh basil and garlic to stir through hearty orzo, top with cherry tomatoes and bake to perfection. Served with juicy king prawns for extra deliciousness.
attributes.name: Garlicky Prawns With Green Butter Orzo

attributes.description: "I love how harissa paste adds hearty heat rather than fiery spice to this winter warmer. This sweet potato-topped pie is full of lentils, aubergine and cherry tomatoes (it's 4 of your 5 a day!), baked till golden with a sprinkling of feta."
attributes.name: Warming Harissa Aubergine & Lentil Pie

attributes.description: You'll mix up meat-free meatballs, flavouring them with cumin, chilli and mint and cook them into an easy curry sauce with spinach and tomato, served with brown rice to the side! Healthy curry for the win!
attributes.name: Joe's Meat-Free Meatball Masala

attributes.description: This satisfying salad is the perfect end to a hectic day. You'll toss golden chicken and lettuce in a creamy, tangy dressing, and top it with crunchy croutons and cheese. Chop, sear, dressing, done!
attributes.name: 10-Min Chicken Caesar Salad & Focaccia Croutons

attributes.description: Creamy courgette, juicy tomatoes and salty feta transform this simple tart into a show-stopping star. Serve with a punchy balsamic rocket salad and crisp roasted potatoes for a super satisfying supper!
attributes.name: Courgette, Cherry Tomato & Feta Tart

attributes.description: You'll top fish with a crisp, cheesy breadcrumb coating and bake over Mediterranean vegetables to create a deliciously simple dinner. Finish with a homemade garlic and parsley oil for a punch of Provençal flavour!
attributes.name: Provençal Crumbed Fish With Roast Vegetables

attributes.description: This recipe is inspired by a Korean dish called jokbal (thin slices of slow cooked pig's trotters served in lettuce cups with basmati rice, green chilli and a fiery sauce). We've replaced the trotters with juicy pork belly slices for this version, to speed things up!
attributes.name: Korean-Style Spicy Pork Belly Lettuce Cups

attributes.sub_ingredients: sugar, mango 48%, sugar cane vinegar, salt, chillies, ginger, garlic
attributes.label: Mango chutney pot (20g)
attributes.name: 1 mango chutney pot (20g)

attributes.label: 4 pcs chicken thigh (w/o skin, w/o bone, 320g)
attributes.name: 320g British chicken thighs

attributes.sub_ingredients: onions (46%), raw cane sugar, citrus pectin, spiced vinegar (cider vinegar, cinnamon, cloves, ginger) concentrated redcurrant juice, extra virgin olive oil, concentrated lemon juice
attributes.label: Onion Marmalade (20g)
attributes.name: 1 onion marmalade pot (20g)

attributes.sub_ingredients: coriander, paprika, pepper, cinnamon, cumin, cayenne pepper, clove, cardamom, nutmeg
attributes.label: Baharat (7 spice, 1 tbsp, 8g)
attributes.name: 1 tbsp baharat

attributes.sub_ingredients: pork(94.9%), salt, Spices ( paprika, spices, paprika flavouring, garlic powder, herbs), dextrose,  antioxidant: sodium ascorbate, preservative: sodium nitrite
attributes.label: Diced chorizo (100g)
attributes.name: 100g British diced chorizo

attributes.sub_ingredients: Water, tomato paste, red pepper puree (10%), sugar, rapeseed oil, garlic puree, ground cayenne pepper, dried red chilli flakes, salt, white wine vinegar, acidity regulator (citric acid), lime juice concentrate, ground star anise, ground cumin, ground coriander, pure olive oil, stabiliser (xanthan gum), preservative (potassium sorbate)
attributes.label: Harissa paste sachet (20g) (reduced salt)
attributes.name: 1 harissa paste sachet (20g)

attributes.sub_ingredients: wheat flour (wheat flour (gluten), calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), egg (12%), water, sugar, palm oil, butter (milk) (2%), egg white, yeast, salt, flavouring, fermented wheat flour, soya flour, emulsifier (mono- and di-acetyl tartaric acid esters of mono- and di-glycerides of fatty acids), colour (mixed carotenes), flour treatment agent (ascorbic acid)
attributes.label: 2 Brioche Buns (FBL)
attributes.name: 2 brioche rolls

attributes.sub_ingredients: water, sugar, white miso paste (soya), cornflour, garlic puree, caramelised sugar syrup, 5 spice, rice vinegar, chilli puree, yeast extract , salt, citric acid
